name: voucherExtension
description: RFC 8366 Voucher artefact extension for device account

attributes.name: createdOn
attributes.description: Provides a yang:data-and-time encoding of the date the voucher was created.

attributes.name: expiresOn
attributes.description: Provides a yang:data-and-time encoding of the date the voucher expires.

attributes.name: assertion
attributes.description: The manufacurer's assertion of how the owner was verified. ['verified', 'logged', 'proximity'].

attributes.name: idevidIssuer
attributes.description: The authority Key Identifier (as defined in Section 4.2.1.1 of RFC 5280) from the pledge's IDevID certificate. Base64URL-encoded [RFC4648] binary data

attributes.name: pinnedDomainCert
attributes.description: An X.509 v3 certificate structure, as specified by RFC 5280, using DER encoding, as defined in ITU-T X.509.

attributes.name: domainCertRevocationChecks
attributes.description: A processing instruction to the device that it MUST (true) or MUST NOT (false) verify the revocation status for the pinned domain certificate.

subAttributes.name: keyType
subAttributes.description: Key type indicator. Currently the following types are recognized: EC, OKP, RSA

subAttributes.name: curveName
subAttributes.description: EC curve name. The currently recognized EC curves include: P-256, P-384, P-521. The currently recognized OKP curves include: Ed25519, Ed448.Required when keytype=EC or OKP.

subAttributes.name: xCoordinate
subAttributes.description: The curve point X. Base64URL-encoded [RFC4648] binary data. Required when keytype=EC or OKP.

subAttributes.name: yCoordinate
subAttributes.description: EC curve point Y. Base64URL-encoded [RFC4648] binary data. Base64URL-encoded [RFC4648] binary data. Required when keytype=EC.

subAttributes.name: modulus
subAttributes.description: RSA modulus. Base64URL-encoded positive integer with arbitrary precision. Note that the value must not contain leading zero-valued bytes. Required when keytype=RSA.

subAttributes.name: exponent
subAttributes.description: RSA exponent. Base64URL-encoded positive integer with arbitrary precision. Note that the value must not contain leading zero-valued bytes. Required when keytype=RSA.

subAttributes.name: signature
subAttributes.description: The signature data. Note that the binary representation must follow the JWA [RFC7518] specifications.
